title: Mausoleum of al-Amir Kibir at the Northern Cemetery
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: 5078. Le Caire. Tombeaux des Chalifs. Mosquée Sultan Beris Bey.  Translation of photographer's description: 5078. Cairo. Tombs of the Califs. Mosque of Sultan Beris Bey. Collector's description: Madrasah-Mausoleum of Emir Kebir. S-lo angle
location: Al-Qarafa al-Kubra; Al-Qāhirah governorate; Egypt; Africa
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
